concept.title: Snapshots
concept.shortdesc: A snapshot is a set of data taken when you monitor a running pipeline. You can review the snapshot when the console is in monitor mode, examining how the data changes from stage to stage. You can also use the snapshot as source data for data preview.

conbody.p: You can take multiple snapshots. The stores up to ten snapshots in memory. You can delete unwanted snapshot data to make room for additional snapshots.
